LanguageData.AC_CookDragonianSteak.label: Grilled Dragonian Steak
LanguageData.AC_CookDragonianSteak.description: Cooked with the tender meat of a Dragonian, rich in protein and flavor. Due to the toughness of the meat, it requires simple preparation; be careful with the heat while cooking.
LanguageData.AC_CookDragonianSteakFour.label: Grilled Dragonian Steak x4
LanguageData.AC_CookDragonianSteakFour.description: Cooked with the tender meat of a Dragonian, rich in protein and flavor. Due to the toughness of the meat, it requires simple preparation; be careful with the heat while cooking.
LanguageData.AC_CookSpicyRabbitHead.label: Cooking Spicy Rabbit Head
LanguageData.AC_CookSpicyRabbitHead.description: Cooked with the meat of the Yuran, the recipe is taught by Archotech.
LanguageData.AC_CookGrilledMoeLotl.label: Grilled Moe Lotl
LanguageData.AC_CookGrilledMoeLotl.description: Grilled Moe Lotl meat on skewers, crispy on the outside and tender on the inside. Such tender meat is rare in the Rimworld.
LanguageData.AC_CookGrilledMoeLotlFour.label: Grilled Moe Lotl x4
LanguageData.AC_CookGrilledMoeLotlFour.description: Grilled Moe Lotl meat on skewers, crispy on the outside and tender on the inside. Such tender meat is rare in the Rimworld.
LanguageData.AC_CookMiliraStew.label: Cooking Milira Meat Stew
LanguageData.AC_CookMiliraStew.description: Made with Milira meat for a rich stew, though delicious, it has a strange texture.
LanguageData.AC_CookCarrox.label: Synthesizing Carrox x2
LanguageData.AC_CookCarrox.description: Synthesizing a bionic vegetarian dish from the meat of the beautiful Fox Tribe. Although the Fox Tribe is beautiful, their meat is not easily tolerated by most.
LanguageData.AC_CookCarroxFour.label: Synthesizing Carrox x8
LanguageData.AC_CookCarroxFour.description: Synthesizing a bionic vegetarian dish from the meat of the beautiful Fox Tribe. Although the Fox Tribe is beautiful, their meat is not easily tolerated by most.
LanguageData.AC_CookMaruCheese.label: Making Cheese Maru
LanguageData.AC_CookMaruCheese.description: Made with Maru's meat to create a cheese meat cake. As long as it's thoroughly crushed, it still has a distinctive snow mountain flavor.
LanguageData.AC_CookKiiroNoodles.label: Making Kiiro Instant Noodles
LanguageData.AC_CookKiiroNoodles.description: Processing Kiiro meat into noodle-like meat strips may confuse some, who might think it is a bowl of little cat tails.
LanguageData.AC_CookMoyoSyrup.label: Making Moyo Syrup
LanguageData.AC_CookMoyoSyrup.description: The syrup extracted from the Moyo's meat, truly a delicacy from a sea slug.
LanguageData.AC_CookViViCake.label: Making Vivi Cake
LanguageData.AC_CookViViCake.description: Press Vivi's meat into paste to make a honey Cake. Vivi meat naturally has a sweet flavor, so no deep processing is needed to make a sweet meat cake.
LanguageData.AC_CookAntySauce.label: Making Anty Sauce
LanguageData.AC_CookAntySauce.description: Press the meat of the anty into a paste to get this small jar of sauce, which can be eaten directly.
LanguageData.AC_CookAntySauceSix.label: Making Anty Sauce x6
LanguageData.AC_CookAntySauceSix.description: Press the meat of the anty into a paste to get this small jar of sauce, which can be eaten directly.
LanguageData.AC_CookSweetAndSourKurin.label: Cooking Sweet and Sour Kurin
LanguageData.AC_CookSweetAndSourKurin.description: Cooking Sweet and Sour Kurin with Kurin meat, this flavor is more popular in the East.
LanguageData.AC_CookSweetAndSourKurin.jobString: Currently cooking Sweet and Sour Kurin.
LanguageData.AC_CookSweetAndSourKurinFour.label: Cooking Sweet and Sour Kurin x4
LanguageData.AC_CookSweetAndSourKurinFour.description: Cooking Sweet and Sour Kurin with Kurin meat, this flavor is more popular in the East.
LanguageData.AC_CookSweetAndSourKurinFour.jobString: Currently cooking Sweet and Sour Kurin x4.
LanguageData.AC_CookMooseAntlerRoast.label: Cooking Moose Antler Roast
LanguageData.AC_CookMooseAntlerRoast.description: Delicious dish made from moose antler meat, flavorful and rich in nutrition, beloved by diners.
LanguageData.AC_CookLalafellRoastRiceBowl.label: Cooking Lalafell Roast Rice Bowl
LanguageData.AC_CookLalafellRoastRiceBowl.description: Mixing Lalafell roast meat with rice, creating a fragrant, unique, and unforgettable dish.
LanguageData.AC_CookLalafellRoastRiceBowl.jobString: Currently cooking Lalafell Roast Rice Bowl.
LanguageData.AC_CookYeLongRouWan.label: Cooking YeLong Meatball
LanguageData.AC_CookYeLongRouWan.description: Made from the meat of YeLong, this tender meatball is said to grant a light body and heightened senses after consumption.
LanguageData.AC_CookKnowledgeBread.label: Cooking Knowledge Bread
LanguageData.AC_CookKnowledgeBread.description: A mysterious bread made from Secretary Rabbit meat. It is said to have originally grown from a pocket.
LanguageData.AC_CookKnowledgeBreadFive.label: Cooking Knowledge Bread x5
LanguageData.AC_CookKnowledgeBreadFive.description: A mysterious bread made from Secretary Rabbit meat. It is said to have originally grown from a pocket.
LanguageData.AC_CookLongHuDou.label: Cooking Dragon-Tiger Fight
LanguageData.AC_CookLongHuDou.description: This dish depicts the story of Dragonian and Kiiro Cat competing for territory in 5509
LanguageData.AC_CookLongFeng.label: Cooking Dragon and Phoenix Presenting Auspice
LanguageData.AC_CookLongFeng.jobString: Cooking Dragon and Phoenix Presenting Auspice.
LanguageData.AC_CookWhiteCutChick.label: Cooking White Cut Chicken
LanguageData.AC_CookWhiteCutChick.description: The recipe for White Cut Chicken comes from Northern cuisine. It was born alongside Tang Dynasty "quick meals" and is a fusion product brought by the migration of scholars and commoners to the South during the Song Dynasty, bringing cultural exchange in food between the regions.
